Package io.github.upendramanike.archguard

Class DependencyChecker

java.lang.Object
io.github.upendramanike.archguard.DependencyChecker
public final class DependencyChecker extends Object
Checks for dependency violations in code architecture.

      public boolean isAllowed(String dependency)
      Checks if a dependency is allowed.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if allowed, false otherwise

      dependency - the dependency to validate
      Throws:
